amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to facilitate the criminal prosecutions of financial institutions operating in the United States, regardless of size.

vote.text: Amendment SA 696 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 696 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Merkley.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 696 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
